title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog should be shown even when dataset is not set
description: The current behavior is that an error is shown when the dataset is not set. However, according to the template requirements, the UI should not perform validation. Therefore, the expected behavior is that the group dialog should be shown regardless of whether the dataset is set or not.
OB: Currently, an error is shown when the dataset is not set.
EB: The group dialog should be shown even when the dataset is not set.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the group dialog.
3. Do not set the dataset.
4. Check if the group dialog is still shown.
